Dear Sarah,

Thank you for reaching out. Please find below the additional information you requested to complete my application.

— Updated Resume —
John Doe

Location: Cupertino, CA

Professional Experience

  – Developed and maintained scalable software solutions.
  – Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.

Skills
• Java, Python, C++, AWS, Azure
• Agile methodologies

Certifications

• Certified Scrum Master (CSM)

— Professional References —
1. Jane Smith – Manager, Google – jane.smith@google.com
2. Mike Johnson – Senior Developer, Facebook – mike.johnson@fb.com
3. Emily Davis – Team Lead, Apple Inc. – emily.davis@apple.com

Please let me know if I can provide any further details.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
John Doe
